page.title: 05Industry
page.content: At the end of the last century the area was highly industrialised.There were large cotton mills in Hyde,which had developed becouse the climatic conditions were suitable and sources of power were readily available. In Denton,hatting was prolific,as it had been for hundreds of years. These industries provided many opportunities for employment which brought with them an influx of population. In the course of this survey we have found that most mills are still in use as industrial units but in a rather different way.They have been let off in individual units to countless small companies. Premises are used for a variety of manufacturing purposes such as light engineering and "the rag trade" but also for recently popular activities such as fitness,karate and judo clubs and dance studios.
